thread.title: World of Adventure meets the brother-sister duo that double as professional skiers
thread.title_full: World of Adventure meets the brother-sister duo that double as professional skiers

author: GRINDTV
title: World of Adventure meets the brother-sister duo that double as professional skiers
text:
World of Adventure meets the brother-sister duo that double as professional skiers 
March 22, 2017 By GRINDTV 
This week on ‘World of Adventure,’ we catch up with two professional skiers with one major thing in common: their last name. 
Angel and Johnny Collinson are a brother and sister duo who also double as professional skiers, sharing both their life’s passion as well as a familial bond. 
Growing up in Snowbird, Utah, the Collinson duo were hitting the snow from the time they could walk, and have spent every winter of their lives charging down snowy slopes. 
“The cool thing about skiing is that it offers me different things, depending on where I am in life and what I need,” says Angel. 
Not only do the siblings bond over their family connection, they also bond over their shared love of the sport. 
Johnny says of their journey to becoming pro, “Our parents showing us what the mountains can do for you, and planting that seed – now I just want to explore that for the rest of my life.” 
More from World of Adventure
